DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate difference clinical outcome Optetrak® Posterior Stabilized ( `` Optetrak® PS '' , Exactech , Gainesville , FL ) Optetrak® Hi-Flex™ ( `` Optetrak® HF '' , Exactech , Gainesville , FL ) knee design . The null hypothesis difference postoperative knee flexion Optetrak® PS Optetrak® HF group .
DOC.brief_title: Optetrak Posterior Stabilized Versus Optetrak Hi-Flex
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patient indicate total knee replacement posterior stabilize device . 2 . Patient age 50 80 year old 3 . Patient Body Mass Index ( BMI ) < 35.0 use follow method ( comparable method ) • BMI = Weight ( lb . ) ÷ Height ( . ) 2 x 703 4 . Patient skeletally mature . 5 . Patient willing participate comply pre postoperative visit requirement , least 1year period , include completion studyrequired questionnaire . 6 .
